Class ec.evm$.WrapBase 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.meta.StdObj
           |
           +----ec.evm$.Inhabitant
                   |
                   +----ec.evm$.WrapBase
public class WrapBase
extends Inhabitant
WrapBase is the base class for all of the wrapped classes. The EVM mainly uses the base as a way to get at the Vat of the object, since the wrapped classes are often used in an environment where their Vat is not otherwise available (i.e., from another thread).

evm$vat
The vat that is object lives in

WrapBase()
Construct a evm$WrapBase, but force it to infer the vat.
WrapBase(StandardVat)
Construct a WrapBase, handing it its vat.

invoke(Method, Object[], Result)
Override of method from ec.util.Tether.

evm$vat 
 protected final StandardVat evm$vat
The vat that is object lives in

WrapBase 
 public WrapBase(StandardVat theVat)
Construct a WrapBase, handing it its vat. This is the more efficient than forcing us to infer the vat more obtusely.

Parameters:
theVat - the vat that this object lives in

 public WrapBase()
Construct a evm$WrapBase, but force it to infer the vat.
